description:
Educational games for kids kindergarten are the most popular way to study for kids nowadays and our memory games will help them in their preschool education.Our new educational games for babies “Learn Colors for Babies” are among the best baby learning games.
The main advantages of our apps:
- Color Switch: red, green, yellow, blue, pink, purple, white, black, brown, orange, gray. This is the basic palette that every child should know by the age of 5 years old.
- Colorful app in several widespread languages: English, Spanish (aprender ingles), Russian and some others. Multilingual study with toddler games free for 2 year olds is useful for those happy children who plan to study foreign languages in the kindergarten and preschool.
- Playing colours apps your baby will broaden his or her vocabulary and expand horizon, as our colours include a lot of new objects and words.
- Our colours for little ones consist of 4 mini educational games for kids kindergarten. Playing these app for little ones allows to play colors and learn names properly. The colours apps for littles also provide baby coloring games for free.
- You can download offline games for toddlers for free. Color games for kids free help save family budget without compromising quality of baby’s education.
- Our baby games train fine motor skills, memory, attentiveness, perseverance, curiosity and other skills that will help your child learn better at school in the future.
The colour can be recommended as:
- Kids learning games for toddlers age 2 or 3 to learn colo
- Free educational games for 1 year olds 4 to 5 .
How to play our colours games:
Colours for kids study is arranged in the following way. On the main screen of the colors and shapes for kids app free preschool there is an oak of knowledge, its branches are swaying in the wind, exotic butterflies are fluttering around. There are circles on the oak branches behind which colours are sheltering. Our apps provide a choice of how to remember hidden colors 4 - either playing educational plays for kids nursery separately, or entering the big circle with an image of a book where fun learning games for kids will change each other automatically.
Now a few words about shapes and colors for boys and girls thanks to which it’s possible to memotize colors for children easily and quickly.
1 Coloring for kids. The coloring for toddlers free provided by this baby learning apps allows to paint objects in one touch. Your baby sees a certain color and 3 items for everyday life which usually are painted in this. Following the logic of the children the baby clicks every object and it becomes painted in the above-mentioned color. Animals become animated in order to show your child the difference between the living and nonliving
2 In the second baby learning games we study shapes and colors for toddlers with the help of 3 contours of ships painted in different colors. Your littles see an unpainted ship with an animal onboard. The child is to recollect what the animal should be and to pull the ship into the corresponding contour
3 In the third part of the children learning free apps we continue to study colors with water transport, this time it’s a boat. The kid sees three differently colored berths. At the bottom of the screen there is a boat with a certain animal. It is necessary to track the boat to the berth corresponding to the color of the animal seated in the boat
4 In the last part your little one will see an apple tree with apples of different colors. One of the animals before comes up to the apple tree. Your child should feed the animal with an apple of the same colour as the animal is.
All the apps learning and consolidating knowledge of colors were developed in cooperation with children's educators and psychologists. Your kid will definitely like to study colors in the new format that our application offers.
